AboutMe:
I am a software engineer from Tel-Aviv, Israel. I've been developing software professionally as a coder, team leader, group manager, project manager, researcher, chief architect and CTO.

Specialties: Extensive experience in large-scale, robust, distributed, secured, low-latency architecture and development; Algorithms (math, statistics, text, data, signal, network, geodesic and spatiotemporal), communications, security engineering, analytics and ontological engineering.
